original: unfold monoid_theory in M_times. destruct M_times as [_ H_mul]. rewrite <- H_mul. rewrite <- distr_l. rewrite <- sum_comm. rewrite H_mul. apply sum_cancel with (x := x ⊗ z). rewrite sum_comm. apply distr_r.
